name: iPhone 17 Pro Max
description: Experience the future with iPhone 17 Pro Max. Powered by Apple’s next-gen A19 Pro chip, it features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, advanced AI-driven photography, all-day battery life, and a premium titanium design built for performance and elegance.

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: Experience powerful performance and sleek design with ExampleBrand’s latest laptop. Equipped with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and a fast 256GB SSD, it ensures seamless multitasking and productivity. The stunning 14-inch Full HD display delivers crisp visuals for work and entertainment.

name: CMF Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in superior sound with SoundBeats Wireless Headphones. Engineered for comfort and clarity, these over-ear headphones deliver rich audio and deep bass for up to 20 hours on a single charge.

name: BOAT Smartwatch
description: Elevate your lifestyle with the FitTech Smartwatch. Designed with a brilliant 1.3-inch AMOLED display and a premium water-resistant finish.

name: BOAT Speaker
description: Bring your music to life with SoundBeats Wireless Speakers. Featuring crisp highs, rich bass, and powerful Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Samsung Smart TV
description: Transform your viewing experience with the Samsung Smart TV. Enjoy cinematic visuals with vibrant colors and smart streaming capabilities.

name: iPad Air Tablet
description: Discover portability and power combined in the iPad Air Tablet featuring Apple M3 chip.

name: Gaming Console
description: Step into next-gen gaming with the PlayPro Console featuring lightning-fast performance and 4K graphics.

name: Canon DSLR Camera
description: Capture every moment in stunning detail with the PixelShot DSLR Camera featuring 24.2MP sensor and 4K video recording.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 ultra
description: Enjoy smooth performance and stunning visuals with this Samsung Android Smartphone.

name: ONEPLUS 5G
description: Experience blazing-fast 5G connectivity with the OnePlus Smartphone.

name: ASUS Gaming Laptop
description: Unleash powerful gaming performance with the ASUS Gaming Laptop equipped with high-end GPU and fast SSD.

name: HP 14S-DQ3036TU
description: The HP Desktop Computer delivers reliable performance for home and office use.

name: BOAT Airdopes Supreme
description: Enjoy crystal-clear sound with Boat Wireless Earbuds designed for comfort and long battery life.

name: SONY WH-1000XM4
description: Immerse yourself in premium sound with Sony Noise Cancelling Headphones.

name: IPHONE 14 PRO MAX
description: Stay connected in style with this Apple Smartphone featuring powerful cameras and long battery life.
